Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Set
    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a generic Room that the Player can be in, and sometimes interact with.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jamal Marri, Megan Theimer
    See Also:
    Set

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Room​(java.lang.String name, java.util.HashSet<Room> neighbors)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addNeighbor​(Room neighbor)
      Adds the inputted Room into the 'neighbors' HashSet, for when the game connects all Rooms together.
      void addPlayer​(Player player)
      Adds the inputted Player into the 'players' HashSet, for when a Player enters this Room.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of this Room for displaying to the user.
      java.util.HashSet<Room> getNeighbors()
      Gets the HashSet of this Room's neighbors, for checking where the Player can move from this current Room.
      java.util.HashSet<Player> getPlayers()
      Gets the HashSet of this Room's players, for checking what Players are currently in this Room.
      void removePlayer​(Player player)
      Removes the inputted Player from the 'players' HashSet, for when a Player leaves this Room.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public Room​(java.lang.String name,
            java.util.HashSet<Room> neighbors)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Room to be displayed to the user.
        neighbors - the neighboring Rooms of this Room.

      • getNeighbors

        public java.util.HashSet<Room> getNeighbors()
        Gets the HashSet of this Room's neighbors, for checking where the Player can move from this current Room.
        Returns:
        the HashSet of neighboring Rooms for this Room
        See Also:
        HashSet

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.HashSet<Player> getPlayers()
        Gets the HashSet of this Room's players, for checking what Players are currently in this Room.
        Returns:
        the HashSet of Players for this Room
        See Also:
        HashSet

      • addNeighbor

        public void addNeighbor​(Room neighbor)
        Adds the inputted Room into the 'neighbors' HashSet, for when the game connects all Rooms together.
        Parameters:
        neighbor - the new Room to add to the 'neighbors' HashSet.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer​(Player player)
        Adds the inputted Player into the 'players' HashSet, for when a Player enters this Room.
        Parameters:
        player - the new Player to add to the 'players' HashSet.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer​(Player player)
        Removes the inputted Player from the 'players' HashSet, for when a Player leaves this Room.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to remove from the 'players' HashSet.
